{{also|五方旗帜}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=五方旗帜|type=22}}

===Etymology===
In ancient times, five [[different]] colors (green, red, white, black and yellow) were used on banners to depict the five directions: east, south, west, north and center.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=wǔfāng qízhì
|c=ng5 fong1 kei4 ci3
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} the [[banner]]s of the [[five]] [[position]]s ([[use]]d for coordinating movement in [[battle]])

* {{zh-l|五方旗}}
